<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map.Entry<BigFraction, BigFraction>> it = knowledgeD.entrySet().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;

<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Iterator to get the key and value of each entry in the hash table, and then use the toString() method to get the string representation of each key and value.
